channel.title: Comments on: The Nun’s Litany (performed by Stephin Merritt)

item.title: By: Flor
item.dc:creator: Flor
item.description: The mp3 is gone... can someone please put it back up? Please?
item.content:encoded: The mp3 is gone… can someone please put it back up? Please?

item.title: By: Liam Freeman
item.dc:creator: Liam Freeman
item.description:
I know being a streaming video this might be a little tricky, but does anyone know a way of ripping the audio of this to an mp3?
I'd love to have it to add to my weighty Magnetic Fields bootleg collection on my ipod.
item.content:encoded:
I know being a streaming video this might be a little tricky, but does anyone know a way of ripping the audio of this to an mp3?

I’d love to have it to add to my weighty Magnetic Fields bootleg collection on my ipod.

item.title: By: Liam Freeman
item.dc:creator: Liam Freeman
item.description: Great video. Although I must admit I enjoy it when Stephin gets other vocalists in to share the duties and add a bit of variety, it's always great to hear how the songs originally sounded.
item.content:encoded: Great video. Although I must admit I enjoy it when Stephin gets other vocalists in to share the duties and add a bit of variety, it’s always great to hear how the songs originally sounded.
